pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 22, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, April 22, 2016:

New York, New York, United States of America

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Opening Ceremony for the Signing Ceremony of the Paris Agreement and will deliver remarks.

General Assembly Hall
United Nations Headquarters
New York, New York

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media


9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Signing Ceremony of the Paris Agreement.

General Assembly Hall
United Nations Headquarters
New York, New York

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media


11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with President Juan Manuel Santos of Colombia.

Room S-2726
United Nations Headquarters
New York, New York

Notes for media:

  • For accredited media only
  • Photo opportunity only


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Media Conference Room, 2nd floor
United Nations Headquarters
New York, New York

Note for media:

  • For accredited media only


1:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an Official Luncheon given by the United Nations Secretary-General.

Closed to media.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
